mapper.sql: ID, name, retailPrice, wholesalePrice, purchasePrice, time, label
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE ${tablename} ( `ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `retailPrice` float DEFAULT NULL, `wholesalePrice` float DEFAULT NULL, `purchasePrice` float DEFAULT NULL, `time` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `label` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='商品大价格的映射';
mapper.insert: insert into ${tablename} (ID, name, retailPrice, wholesalePrice, purchasePrice, time, label) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{retailprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{wholesaleprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{purchaseprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ${tablename}
ID,
name,
retailPrice,
wholesalePrice,
purchasePrice,
time,
label,

mapper.update:
update ${tablename}
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
retailPrice = #{retailprice,jdbcType=REAL},
wholesalePrice = #{wholesaleprice,jdbcType=REAL},
purchasePrice = #{purchaseprice,jdbcType=REAL},
time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
